What process does a 3D printer use?

options.C: Adding layers to build a part

questions.question: What is the advantage of Object-Oriented Programming over procedural programming (PP)

options.A: It runs faster than procedural programming
options.B: Code reusability saves time in development
options.C: Code is always smaller and more efficient than in PP

options.A: A child class is derived from a parent object
options.B: An Object is derived from a parent class and inherits all properties
options.C: A class is derived from another class

options.A: The same method in different Objects (of the same class) can perform different tasks
options.B: SDifferent classes derived from the same parent class can easily morph/transform into each other
options.C: An object derived from a class can transform into another object during runtime or compiling
